$(italic)You think back happily to the days when you set little traps for your friends. Touching the wrong block, they were completely buried by sand.
By now, your friends aren't so easily fooled. Seems like modern problems require modern solutions.$(br2)So much room for possibilities!

By adding redstone and magic to sand, it gets an interesting property: like other blocks, it stays in the air until the redstone crystals inside it start vibrating.Redstone sand behaves like a normal block until the moment it gets a redstone signal. In that case the laws of gravity force it to drop.$(br2)The redstone trigger propagates through all connected blocks.
